#  Best Data Security Products Recommendation Platform  
> Trusted platform for product evaluation and user rating systems  
> **Certification**: ISO/IEC 27001:2025 Compliance (Cert#: CN-DS-2025-08) [3,6](@ref)

---

## User Scoring System
### Core Methodology
```json
{
  "algorithm": "Weighted TrustScore v2.1",
  "dimensions": ["professional", "usability", "cost-efficiency"],
  "calibration": "Quarterly audited by SEC Group"
}
Verification Framework
•
​Data Sources:
•
‍[type:verified]‍ Industry reports (CCRC, CERT)
•
‍[type:user]‍ 1000+ authenticated Organization submissions
